detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: We have a proven track record of going up against billion-dollar corporations on behalf of those who don’t have the resources to heal and recover.

detailsData.title: Personal Attention
detailsData.content: We apply 100% of our resources to empower each client. We offer bilingual English/Spanish services, and treat clients with a down-to-earth sincerity.

detailsData.title: Nationwide Representation
detailsData.content: We serve clients both in Texas and nationwide, ensuring that no matter where you are, you have access to high-quality legal representation.

detailsData.title: No Up-Front Fees
detailsData.content: We work on a contingency fee basis, meaning there are no up-front fees for you. We strive to build a strong case quickly to reach a resolution sooner than later.

subHeading: Texas Law Firm Pierce Skrabanek | Helping the injured
valueProp: At Pierce Skrabanek, our dedicated advocacy and compassionate representation means clients can trust us to obtain the justice and remedies they deserve. If you’ve been injured due to another’s negligence, you need a law firm that can deliver the results you need.
